system.requirements: Any Career, RT Rank 3+, Agility 35+, Intelligence 35+. Must have tamed a wild creature in the past without being fatally mauled in the process.
system.descriptionText: Beastmasters are those inclined towards the keeping, training, and commanding a menagerie of exotic creatures. Such creatures could aid in battle and perform acts their owners and companions could not.
system.effects:
Replace new Rank's Advances with that of the Beastmaster
Allows for the purchasing of the Unique Talents Bestial Minion and Coordinated Strike.
